definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The discount given by the syndicate to members of the selling group.
sentences.chinese: 辛迪加向出售團成員提供的折扣。

sentences.english: Several firms of mechanical engineering have been syndicated.
sentences.chinese: 幾家機械工程公司已組成了機械工程辛迪加。

sentences.english: There is no reason to assume that Luciano sired the ruling Syndicate Commission idea either.
sentences.chinese: 沒來由以爲播下盧西亞諾在朝辛迪加委員會概念。
他們已把我們的工廠置於辛迪加的管理之下。

sentences.english: The mystical organization syndicate, conspires to harass the social order.
sentences.chinese: 神祕組織辛迪加，密謀擾亂社會治安。

sentences.english: The two businesses joined in syndicate for the development project.
sentences.chinese: 兩個企業在開發項目上形成了統一經營辛迪加模式。

definition: plutocracy/monopolistic corporation, esp. prewar Japanese zaibatsu/Korean chaebol/plutocrat/tycoon/oligarch/financial magnate
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
